title: New: The Japanese House – Still
content:
This stunning debut track from the UK’s The Japanese House is undoubtedly one of this years finest first outings.

With the sort of intimate atmosphere that helped make Lapsley’s early recordings so endearing, merged with a manipulated vocal not too far from Bon Iver’s sophomore LP, Still showcases a unique songwriting ability, alongside an alluring grasp of raw human emotions. A devastating and otherworldly debut; immerse yourself in it below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
